title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Dec 22 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Dec 22 2021
description:
Journalist David Zweig returns to the show to discuss his article in The Atlantic: The CDC’s Flawed Case for Wearing Masks in School. He told Clay: "Unless you can quantify this benefit, and it seems really small, I don't think it's worth making my kid wear a mask for two years, or even two weeks, for that matter." CNN edits Jesse Watters' comments on Fauci to fit their narrative. Will Gavin Newsom's draconian covid restrictions force the NFL to cancel the L.A. Super Bowl?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
